function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Flawed or potentially fraudulent studies being used in meta-analyses to promote ivermectin as a wonder drug","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation and inappropriate use of ivermectin","Mitigation":"Rigorous validation and scrutiny of studies before inclusion in meta-analyses","Technologies":"Data analysis and validation tools","People":"Public, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, peer-reviewed journals"},{"Description":"Preprints with impossible numbers and duplicate data circulating online without formal retraction","Impact":"Continued influence of discredited preprints on the internet","Mitigation":"Integration of authority to formally retract fraudulent research into preprint servers' processes","Technologies":"Online moderation and verification tools","People":"Online readers, researchers, professionals","Owner":"Preprint servers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of scrutiny and blind trust in academic research culture","Impact":"Acceptance and dissemination of dodgy research practices","Mitigation":"Promotion of transparency and scrutiny in research, release of raw patient data for review","Technologies":"Data sharing and transparency platforms","People":"Clinical trial investigators, meta-analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
